title: Verify parity, build, typecheck, and close website epic
description: Run site typecheck/build and manual parity checks for navigation, theme, routes, docs behavior, media fallback, and frame pictogram stability; close tasks and epic after validation.

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Verified @korporus/site with successful typecheck/build, route generation checks for required pages/docs/features, theme/video wiring inspection, and frame-pictogram interface validation.
